<S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> on our <S%H1157>behalf,<s%> for <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> is <S%H3898>warring<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us; <S%H194>perhaps<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6213>deal<s%> with us according to <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> <S%H6381>acts,<s%> that [the enemy] may <S%H5927>withdraw<s%> from us."

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am about to <S%H5437>turn<s%> <S%H5437>back<s%> the <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> you are <S%H3898>warring<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> who are <S%H6696>besieging<s%> <S%H5921><s%> you <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H2346>wall;<s%> and I shall <S%H622>gather<s%> them into the <S%H8432>center<s%> of <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%>

"Then <S%H310>afterwards,<s%> <S%H3651><s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> over <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants<s%> and the <S%H5971>people,<s%> even those who <S%H7604>survive<s%> in <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> from the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H340>foes,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>lives;<s%> and he will <S%H5221>strike<s%> them <S%H5221>down<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%> He will not <S%H2347>spare<s%> them <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2550>have<s%> <S%H2550>pity<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7355>compassion.<s%>"'

O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord:<s%> <S%H1777>"Administer<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> every <S%H1242>morning;<s%> And <S%H5337>deliver<s%> the [person] who has been <S%H1497>robbed<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of his <S%H6231>oppressor,<s%> That My <S%H2534>wrath<s%> may not <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> like <S%H784>fire<s%> And <S%H1197>burn<s%> with <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H3518>extinguish<s%> [it,] <S%H4480>Because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of their <S%H4611>deeds.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> you, O <S%H6010>valley<s%> <S%H3427>dweller,<s%> O <S%H6697>rocky<s%> <S%H4334>plain,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "You men who <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>'Who<s%> will <S%H5181>come<s%> <S%H5181>down<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us? Or <S%H4310>who<s%> will <S%H935>enter<s%> into our <S%H4585>habitations<s%>?'

"But I shall <S%H6485>punish<s%> you according to the <S%H6529>results<s%> of your <S%H4611>deeds,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "And I shall <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in its <S%H9194>forest<s%> That it may <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H5439>environs.<s%>"' "
